## createApp() function

Create a new application builder.

**Signature:**

```typescript
declare function createApp(): AppBuilder<undefined, Record<string, never>>;
```
**Returns:**

[AppBuilder](./dsl.appbuilder.md)<!-- -->&lt;undefined, Record&lt;string, never&gt;&gt;

## Example


```typescript
const app = createApp()
  .state({ count: 0 })
  .onKey('q', ({ quit }) => quit())
  .view(({ state }) => text('Count: ' + state.count))
  .build()
```
